tool_description: Coordinates and schedules screening interviews between volunteer applicants and organizational representatives, managing calendar availability and logistics.

applicant_id.description: Unique identifier for the volunteer applicant

interviewer_id.description: Identifier for the staff member conducting interview

applicant_availability.description: List of date-time slots when applicant is available

interviewer_availability.description: List of date-time slots when interviewer is available

error_messages: No matching availability: Applicant and interviewer schedules do not align
Invalid interview type: Use one of [phone, video, in_person]
Invalid duration: Interview duration must be between 15-120 minutes
Insufficient availability slots: Provide at least 3 time options for scheduling
Invalid date format: Use proper date-time format for availability slots
usage: Provide applicant and interviewer availability along with interview preferences to find optimal scheduling match and coordinate screening interview.

interview_id.description: Unique identifier for the scheduled interview

confirmation_sent.description: Whether confirmation messages were sent to participants
